column3: Time is of the essence. If you have something to ask, make it quick.
What would you like to do?
You will be removed from your party. Proceed?
The operation was a success! Here's your reward, and don't let anyone tell you that you didn't earn it.
You will leave the instance once all party members have collected their rewards.
Well, well. It looks like you have a full bag.
Make room in your inventory and speak with the battlewarden once again to receive your reward.
Can't you see I'm busy attending to your allies? I don't have time to chat.
You will be removed from the party. Proceed?
The operation was a success! Here's your payment, and as promised, I've thrown in a little extra, so that you may consider returning to aid us once again.
A bonus has been added to your reward.
